dmca.title: copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Chuck Hunner [mailto:hunner@charter.net] 
Sent: Friday, March 11, 2005 9:00 AM
To: Lance Crosby
Subject: copyright infringement

Dear Sir,

According to the Copyright statement at
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html,

 www.jyotishyagya.com hosted on your servers is in violation of your AUP at

http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html. They are copying substantial
copyrighted material from www.jyotish-yagya.com.

I am  concerned that your client, Hemant Sharma, in spite of my request to
cease and desist, continues to use my Copyright material.

www.jyotishyagya.com was registered 2004-12-11. See
http://www.whois.sc/jyotishyagya.com

I registered and started using all the content being plagiarized from
www.jyotish-yagya.com on Aug 17, 2001. See
http://www.whois.sc/jyotish-yagya.com

I hope that this is adequate notification. Should you need a hard copy of my
notice, I'll be happy to supply it to you.

Sincerely,
Chuck Hunner
Owner of www.jyotish-yagya.com
--
No virus found in this outgoing message.
Checked by AVG Anti-Virus.
Version: 7.0.308 / Virus Database: 266.7.1 - Release Date: 3/9/2005
